services.title: Teacher Training & Professional Development
services.description: We design and deliver continuous professional development (CPD) programs that improve teaching practice, subject mastery, classroom management, and learner-centred pedagogy.

services.title: Stakeholder Capacity Development
services.description: We strengthen the capacity of education stakeholders—including school leaders, policy makers, and community actors—through training, coaching, and systems support. We help build collaborative and effective education ecosystems.

services.title: Research, Monitoring & Evaluation
services.description: We conduct educational research, needs assessments, and evaluations to inform policy, program design, and implementation.

services.title: Policy Advocacy & Transformation
services.description: We support governments and institutions to develop, review, and implement education policies that are inclusive, evidence-based, and aligned with national and global education goals.

approach.title: Participatory & Contextualized
approach.description: We co-design solutions with clients and communities to ensure relevance and sustainability.

about.title: About PDIA
about.subtitle: Advancing quality, relevance, and equity in learning.
about.whoWeAre: PDIA Ltd is a leading education-focused consultancy firm committed to advancing quality, relevance, and equity in learning. We specialize in education system strengthening through evidence-based solutions in curriculum design, teacher training, ICT integration, and capacity building for key education stakeholders. And advocacy for integration of evidence-based innovations into national policy frameworks. With a team of experienced educators, policy experts, curriculum specialists, digital learning experts and instruction and pedagogy experts, we partner with governments, NGOs, schools, and development organizations to transform education.
about.mission: To deliver innovative, inclusive, and sustainable education solutions that empower educators, learners, and communities to thrive in a dynamic and digital world.
about.vision: To be a trusted partner in redefining education through locally relevant, globally informed, and technology-enhanced solutions.
